name: ReasonML
description: Add support for ReasonML language. Also add support for OCaml and Dune.
notes:
• #284 - Support for OCamlFormat
  • #279 - Matched brace isn't highlighted in .res source file
  • #278 - let (//) incorrectly parsed as comment
  • #277 - Wrong module resolution for js object
  • #110 - Language injection in strings
  • New plugin icon

Full change log...

To see how to integrate reason tools (bsc, refmt), go to the website.
